function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Mental health crisis leading to anxiety, burnout, and other serious conditions among employees","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"In-person interactions during interviews and onboarding process","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employees not complying with social distancing rules","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear communication and understanding of workplace rules","category":"Working","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of clear communication about policies & protocols leading to confusion and non-compliance.","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Feelings of loneliness and gratitude among employees affecting mental health and well-being.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mental health challenges due to pandemic-related emotional impact","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate communication and training on safety protocols and new skills for employees returning to work","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employees concerned about exposure to contagious diseases in the workplace.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Economic uncertainty affecting employees' ability to meet basic needs.","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employees being infected with covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contagion for frontline covid-19 fighters","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear communication and guidance leading to anxiety and stress among employees.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health crisis and covid-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High employee engagement and satisfaction levels may lead to complacency and reduced vigilance in maintaining health and safety protocols, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of alignment between employee engagement initiatives and health and safety protocols, leading to a compromised environment for disease transmission control","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Disengaged employees can impact on the guest experience and the business loses not only money but reputation as a result.","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential for contagious diseases to spread through close contact among employees and guests","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emotional support and engagement with employees","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of open and honest discussions about business realities and upcoming plans","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate employee engagement, learning, and development measures","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of control of covid-19 in informal settlements","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perception of top-down control measures as oppressive","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Ignored public health regulations in informal settlements","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stigmatization and blame of residents of informal settlements","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor coordination between health authorities and urban stakeholders","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges related to social, political, and economic contexts influencing vulnerability to disease outbreaks","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and partnerships with local community structures and authorities","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on online crowdsourced mapping","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and communication between data producers","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear and reliable information about the disease and control measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance and unrest due to externally imposed restrictions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community-led development practices may facilitate spread of covid-19 due to in-person contact with high-risk groups.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and rumors spread through radio and social media may foster confusion, distrust, or panic within the community.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective settlement-wide quarantines during the ebola outbreak led to violence and were ultimately abandoned.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stigma associated with contracting covid-19 and social distancing messages exacerbating social marginalization.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in accessing services and information for displaced people living in informal settlements.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender-specific impacts, including increased caring burdens for women and girls, uneven earning potential, and higher exposure risk for female health workers.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accelerated spread of virus due to population fleeing or traveling under the radar","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Haphazard health seeking behavior in severe disease cases","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perception of inadequate or inappropriate care at hospitals","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of seeking care due to messaging about no cure for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of evidence on social and environmental transmission dynamics, leading to uncertainty in understanding and mitigating transmission vulnerability.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly documented disease burdens and reliance on informal healthcare providers","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on informal settlements and the novelty of the disease","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mistrust in government messaging and control measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Organizational challenges of epidemic control require meaningful local involvement","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data about informal settlements prior to and during emergencies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited availability of accurate and timely information about covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of digital technology may compromise privacy and data security.","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"}]}
